description: Ms. codex. Title from fol. 2a. Fol. 97b, 98b blank. Physical description: 17-23 lines per page; written in naskhi in black ink on cream European glazed, laid paper. Rubrication and catchwords; text framed in red on fol. 3a-89b. Text on fol. 2 framed by double red lines and black line. Fol. 98 is detached. Incip.: ... لفظ سؤال من سىدى الوالد العلامة احمد بن صالح ...
author: Suḥūlī, Yaḥyá ibn Ṣāliḥ, 1721 or 1722-1794 or 1795
abstract: A selection of fatwas by the Zaydi jurist Yaḥyá ibn Ṣāliḥ al-Suḥūlī given in response to questions asked by Aḥmad ibn Yaḥyá al-Suḥūlī. Text is on fol. 2b-97a. Supplication on fol. 1a; fatwas by "baʻḍ al-ʻulamāʼ" on fol. 1b, 98a.
alternative: من فتاوي الوالد القاضي العلامة يحيى بن صالح السحولي
title: Nubdhah yasīrah min fatāwá
creator: سحولي، يحيى بن صالح، 1721 or 1722-1794 or 1795
subject: Fatwas—History—18th century—Sources
